The chaos is beginning to clear from the restart, and it's been a 
while since the last council election, so I doubt it will be long 
until the next one (it MUST have been more than 3 months by now).  So 
I'll go ahead and announce I'm running.  Here are my promises:

1. I'll include "no protohumans" on the rules page so as not to 
confuse any newbies (a change that's LONG overdue)
2. I'll try to imploy my ideas in a less outlandish way, and with the 
agreement of the rest of the council
3. I'll try to create a plot synopsis of the entire Transformers 
history and post it on the site for anyone who wants to join, but 
doesn't know anything about Transformers (or else hasn't seen either 
G1 or Beast Wars).
4. I will NOT ban LN for no reason other than I don't like him
5. I will remain open to all new ideas, even if they interferre with 
my own
6. I will try to get new, capable members, and motivate the old ones.

Have I won even 1 single vote yet (I'm not asking will you vote for 
me, simply if you think there's a good chance anyone will)?
